other_tests.findings: Minor atelectasis at each lung base, trace bilateral pleural effusions, numerous small stones in the gallbladder (4 to 8 mm in diameter), no biliary dilatation, gallbladder mostly full with no wall thickening or edema, inflammatory changes in the fat adjacent to the pancreas consistent with acute interstitial pancreatitis, pancreas enhances throughout, medium sized simple cyst in the mid left kidney (25 mm in diameter).
